thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: Born Tofly
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 Born Tofly

author: Born Tofly
title: Born Tofly
text: I ordered at least 50 items on Banggood until now. Every single order arrived except one which was promptly refunded. I only had a quality issue with one item and after sending two short emails describing the problem, a new item was delivered directly. If you pick the right shipment method it only takes about 2 Weeks. This is a very good reseller all about Quadrocopters and tools you would pay a lot more in your country. Qulaity is rock solid. Contact is fast an nice.
